page.title: 08THE HAILSHAM FUN RUN
page.content:
The Hailsham{Fun Run}started in 1983. The organisers,who are the {Hailsham Rotary Club,}thought it would be a good idea to have an annual event for the people of Hailsham and District to watch and take part in. So far a total of 2420 have run the 9 mile course and have raised Â£2200 for various charites. The chairmain of the Fun Run is also a magistrate and a local butcher.
As well as the runners about 90 people are needed to help organise the race. It is intended to hold the race again in 1986.
I took part in the Fun Run and I raised Â£10.I was number 361.Three other children from our school took part.We all finised and got a medal.
